content:
Select a Service Gateway appliance specification based on type and number of endpoints. When deploying a Service Gateway for endpoints, you can choose between the standard and minimal appliance specifications based on the services enabled and type and number of endpoints. - **Standard image**: 12 CPUs, 16 GB memory, 500 GB storage - **Minimal image**: 8 CPUs, 12 GB memory, 200 GB storage :::note The provided sizing data is for reference only. Actual traffic load might vary by environment. :::
Endpoint type Appliance specification

 Maximum number of endpoints

  • Forward Proxy Service
